title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2K.03 - Style and Size of Lettering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2K.03 - Style and Size of Lettering

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 01. INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 00A All letters and numbers on Tourist-Oriented Directional
signs, Advance TOD signs, and TOD Business panels should be upper-case. Any
legend on a logo should be proportional to the size of the
logo. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2K.03

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
